eger.maxValue},

>  hey hey hey but what if i have created=
 test suite that runs 
>multiple tests including above one . Now suppose th=
is test fails & if

icular test

That's a fine po=
int. I just ran into this problem using SUnit, as I am learning Smalltalk. =
I'm not sure how to deal with this just yet. I don't use the UI-based test =
runners that often and I almost never run one test at a time, so it hadn't =
yet come up.

This is a problem with automatic test collectors, in general.=
 They don't play well with parameterized tests.
